content.question: Using the results from all treatments, describe the effect of BaP alone and UVA alone compared with the effect of the combined treatment of BaP and UVA on DNA.

frqParts.text: Using the results from all treatments, describe the effect of BaP alone and UVA alone compared with the effect of the combined treatment of BaP and UVA on DNA.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
